alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:17PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... Southwestern Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 917 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Benton to near Davenport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Montgomery, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Meadville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Benton, Pine Level, Beechwood, Dublin, Snowdoun, Grady, Sellers, Davenport, Ramer, Pintlala, Strata and Naftel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
